EmailTemplate.name: MBO Partners Introduction (1344547266.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: MBO Partners Introduction (1344547266.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Dan, My name is Nicolette Taylor and I am a Consultant Services Advisor with MBO Partners. Steve Arhancet forwarded your information to me and I wanted to thank you for speaking with him today regarding using MBO for your 1099 workers. I will be your point of contact moving forward, and will be speaking with and setting up the consultants you are going to be sending over to MBO. I have enclosed a few documents for your review, one being a referral template that you can fill out and send to me each time you get a new person that you would like to speak with me and get set up as well as a sample SOW. We can discuss how you would prefer to hand off the consultants to me, either by sending me the referral template and me reaching out to them by phone/email or if you would prefer to send them an email with a link to my calendar and information about our program to have them set up a time to speak (or both). · This is the referral template you can send me with pertinent information about the consultant: http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Exec_Referral_Template_General.pdf <http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Exec_Referral_Template_General.pdf> · This is a blank SOW form you will complete and send to me before the consultant starts working: http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Exec_SOW.pdf <http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Exec_SOW.pdf> I will also be sending you a separate email tomorrow that is a template you can forward over to the consultant that will have information about MBO as well as a link to my calendar that I mentioned so they can easily schedule a time to speak with me to make the process as streamlined as possible. If you would like to schedule some time to speak with me you can click on my online calendar <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&https://my.timedriver.com/9TGRK?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCf1BPsAly4v%2BSJ7DNiz3FaZGnqbszCvjruKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> to select a convenient time for you. Thank you and I look forward to speaking with you soon and working with your organization! Have a great evening,Nicolette ___________________________________Nicolette TaylorConsultant Services AdvisorMBO Partners t: 703.793.6281f: 703.793.6456e: ntaylor@mbopartners.com <bbentley@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files.
